'''''A Study in Sable''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to use the [[Key to Some Place in the Institute]] and access the special room.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The mechanism where to use the Key to Some Place is in the south-east corner of the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]].
<gallery>
Achievement A Study in Sable Location.png|Map Location
Achievement A Study in Sable Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name of this achievement is a reference to ''{{w|A Study in Scarlet}}'', a {{w|Sherlock Holmes}} novel by Sir {{w|Arthur Conan Doyle}}.
